songs.title: B&J
songs.lyrics:
We have our strength (we have)
Small bosses still in progress (we have)
As we say in BO$$ our great-great-grandchildren are already millionaires
Future numbers one on the Forbes list (one, one)
We're going to darken this list (we're going) I do not know what they will be when formed
Just follow Bonnie and Clyde
Dad and Mom are respected
Be like B and Jay Make it rain in the summer
Stop the world and steal it for you
You can small heirs (can)
With love B
